definition: the central structure of the lens that is surrounded by the cortex
details:
noun
- the central structure of the lens that is surrounded by the cortex
= synonyms: lens nucleus
- a part of the cell containing DNA and RNA and responsible for growth and reproduction
= synonyms: cell nucleus, karyon
- any histologically identifiable mass of neural cell bodies in the brain or spinal cord
- a small group of indispensable persons or things
= synonyms: core
- the positively charged dense center of an atom
- (astronomy) the center of the head of a comet
